entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: Splash screen and BackgroundImageSource not working #6838
  • Add Android permission documentation to every API which requires this permission #6833
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #6831
  • Loading native iOS library #6830
  • FlexLayout doesn't account for children size #6826
  • [Android] SwipeItem Unexpectedly Turns IconImageSource Into Only A Cutout When Setting BackgroundColor #6825
  • Show output for Release applications on Android #6824
  • Document how to customize WebView settings in a Blazor MAUI app #6823
    6.0.300
  • Navigating via tabs and then scrolling in listview causes app to crash #6822
  • Consolidate Background properties and expose ImageBrush #6821
    .NET 7
  • Backwards navigation is not triggering ApplyQueryAttributes #6817
  • #elif WINDOWS doesn't work #6815
  • Onboard to source.dot.net #6814
    .NET 7
  • .NET MAUI RC 2 app using SaxonCS NuGet library runs fine on Windows but crashes with "[libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR)" on Android #6811
  • [Windows] ContentView with ContentPresenter measured and arranged incorrectly #6808
  • Border Rendered Incorrectly While giving Corner Radius in some cases #6805
  • Unable to customize the UI Automation Name property of CollectionView items #6803
  • Label sometimes displays hugely wrong font size and spacing #6801
  • Review FlexLayoutManager measurement for possible performance improvements #6798
    .NET 7
  • Support unconstrained measurement in FlexLayoutManager #6796
    .NET 7

Closed

  • Toolbar overlaps with Android notification bar #6392
    6.0.300
  • Editor AutoSize on Text Change Surpass the border around it #5991
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout has no height in ListView #6380
    6.0.300
  • [Android] - ScrollView does not scroll since RC2 when the contained StackLayout has a margin #6602
    6.0.300
  • BarTextColour remains [white] for ToolBarItem on Android #6523
    6.0.300
  • Side menu (left and right) like Shell Flyout but for every page (standalone) #5958
  • Add ability to use maui-blazor from http context #5639
  • Issues with collection view displaying only first item and scrolling crashes app #6484
    6.0.300
  • iOS Crash on populating CollectionView with data #6134
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #4756
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView not provide "MediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture" #3033
    .NET 7
  • Blazor MAUI project support linked file properly #3887
    .NET 7
  • MediaPlayer or VLC Player #6764
  • [bug][android]ModalPage will not work properly #6532
    6.0.300
  • What is the difference between HapticFeedback.Current and .Default? #6799
  • FormattedString Spans overlapping #4838
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView items not rendered when using EmptyView #6119
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] AppThemeBinding survives longer then it should if Binding type is OneTime #3188
    6.0.300
  • RC2 Border.Stroke Shape is not fully displayed #6804
  • Video Splash Screen #2645
  • Crash while resizing window with grouped ListView #6132
    6.0.300
  • Flyout labels aren't vertically centered #5764
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Crash: Canvas trying to draw too large #3463
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Force parent invalidation on Margin and LayoutOptions changes #6836
  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
  • [android] update AOT profiles #6834
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix the device tests #6832
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300
  • Visibility should affect the container if there is one #6828
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Add a locked flyout immediately to the view #6827
    area/shell 🐢
  • Add default BackgroundColor to controls in Styles #6820
    area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Show SearchHandler on Windows #6818
    area/controls 🎮
  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • Fix Share does not block when awaited on iOS #6812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.2.6.1 to 1.3.0 #6809
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Tizen] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler for Tizen #6795
    area/controls 🎮
  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Reinstate Forms hack for unconstrained FlexLayout measurement #6797
    area/layout 🔲
  • Lay out ScrollView inset view at correct size on Android #6816
    area/layout 🔲
  • Modify Package.appxmanifest templates to include placeholder values and overwrite these values in the GeneratePackageAppxManifest task #6829
  • Merge the BackgroundImageSource into Background #6819
    t/bug, t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300
  • [GH-6523] Fix toolbar text color #6765
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300
  • Remove `Current` from HapticFeedback #6802
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Observable collection events not firing in the correct order with CollectionView.BeginInvokeOnMainThread #6546
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300
  • Base the Modal Size and position off the root window view #6792
  • Fix overlapping text with Label spans #6789
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Always make sure to stop observing the old adapter #6807
  • [Tizen] Bump Tizen.UIExtensions from 0.6.0-pre1 to 0.8.0-pre1 #6615
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen

Updated

  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601
    area/collectionview 📃, partner/android, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
